bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Combined Designation of all Pathological Condition that primarily have their onset in winter. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 and Pu ji fang 普濟方 : 胃而有 石曰冬病 , “When the stomach [movement in the vessels] is stone-like, this is called ‘ winter disease ’”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Si shi yong yao li 四時用藥例 , “Guide to drug use in the course of the four seasons”: 春得秋病 , 夏得冬病 , 神而明之 , 機而行 之 , 變通權宜 , 又不可泥一也 , “If in spring one is affected by an autumn disease, if in summer one is affected by a winter disease , one must do everything to understand this, and act flexibly and do what is expedient. It would be wrong to cling to just one principle”.
